summary: Animal blood au Right so i gotta write this shit down bc I’ve had it stuck in my head for a while and I tried to write it down...
body:
Animal blood au

Right so i gotta write this shit down bc I’ve had it stuck in my head for a while and I tried to write it down but I wasn’t quite sure how so imma vomit all my ideas down here, hope u enjoy. 

So basically its a world where there are normal humans, as u do, and there are animals, but then there is a third race which share traits from both. I don’t have anymore of a creative name atm than ‘animal bloods’ but this shit is a work in progress. 

So like, this third race has both animal and human characteristics and how they are treated varies depending on the place. They’re mostly human, only born to either animal blood parents or human parents as the transformation is caused by a faulty gene in their dna, so they’re conscious of their actions and are able to control themselves.

(Though it is possible for them to go ‘feral’) 

However, their treatment in most first world countries are negative as people start to panic what these animal bloods can do. They have control over their own powers, but does that make them worse? Who’s stopping them from transforming in a bank? In a school? What’s stopping them from using their unharnessed powers for good? 

Unlike in Wakanda, where their royal family consistently consisted on a black panther blood line, America has a different policy. They put these animal bloods in special facilities, if they’re lucky, where they’re treated like they’re things to be gawked at and are barely given any room to be either animal or human. 

These creatures have barely any laws to protect them, other than that the government can’t kill them and must provide them with some sort of environment. They don’t count under human rights or animal rights either. They’re treated as subhuman.

These creatures can be kept by their parents, if they’re human, until they’re legally an adult – then they’re taken away to one of the facilities – or if the parents choice so they can be taken away at birth. Parents also have the option to terminate the pregnancy, no matter how late, if they have evidence of the animal blood, and (Though it’s no longer legal) used to be able to act the doctor to kill the child once it was born.


So like that’s the background, here is the characters (which are all canine or feline btw):

  • Tony: Tony is a tiger blood (yeah, Tony the Tiger, sue me) and he was born to two human parents. They kept him and raised him, ignoring his deformities and locking him away when he turned, and hoped that the laws may have changed enough that he’d be his own person by the time he was eighteen. The same day he learned about their death at 17 was the same day he was taken to live at the facility. In fact, it was the same hour. He’s lived there since then, watching animal bloods come and go as the only person that was still there from day one was his best friend, his now only friend, James Rhodes. Tony’s markings included an orange colouring on his tan skin that stretched from the top of his neck, back of his forearms, down his back, and behind his legs, them all marked with tiger stripes. Some of the strips also stretched to his lower jaw. He also had pointed teeth, as most canine and feline bloods did, and his nails grew in sharper.
  • Rhodey: Rhodey is a black jaguar blood. He’s been in that facility only a few months longer than Tony had and had comforted the teenager when he’d arrived since he was older and was more used to facilities. He took care of him, protected him from the humans, made sure he ate, and helped him become confident in the animal form he’d been suppressing his whole life. He’d defend his best friend to his last breath. His markings were simple dark spots that peppered his arms, legs, back, and stomach, barely visible against his dark skin unless you focused, and had the same teeth and nails as his friend.
  • Steve: Steve is a lion blood, but not even that, he’s a white lion blood. One of the rarer animal bloods out there. He was thrown in whilst in his thirties and was rather vocal in his hatred as he revealed that he’d never been in a facility before, despite his age. This definitely made him a hero among the kids and with some of the adults too. Steve had made his own pack with friends and managed to lay low for years, helping other animal bloods in need, but only two of them were captured, him and his friend Bucky, a wolf blood that was put into the canine habitat. He had no marking, just skin a little paler than it could be and thick blonde hair as well as a beard to accompany it, giving him almost a mane even when he wasn’t sulking around in his lion form. He also had the same teeth and nails.

The rest imma go in less detail for because I haven’t completely thought them through yet

  • Bucky: A wolf blood. Appearance is a black fairly intimidating wolf, contrasts his best friend wildly. Doesn’t talk too much and transforms into human form rarely.
  • Peter and Aunt May: both wolf bloods, dark brown in colour. Peter is only seven and has never See life outside in the facility, May adopted him when he came in as basically a new born infant.
  • Miles: Black jaguar blood, like Rhodey. Is five and has taken to Rhodey and Tony like a fish takes to water, referring to them both as their uncles. They’re unsure what happened to his actual family. Has same marks as Rhodey.
  • Scott: a wolf blood. Has more of a reddish coat despite his dark coloured hair. Very excitable despite the circumstances. He also managed to avoid the facility for most of his life, and even had a daughter at one point before he was taken away. His ex-wife, their daughter, and new husband do come to see hi once a month, even if it’s through zoo like bars.
  • Hope: Coyote blood. Daughter of hank and was born in captivity. Doesn’t socialise too much but Scott doesn’t leave her alone. Admittedly, she does like to hear him tell her about the outside world.
  • Hank: Coyote blood. Lost his mate after Hope was born due to the workers separating them to as they didn’t want any more breeding between them. They left Hope to stay with her father and, though heartbroken, he did his best to keep her and look after her.
  • Pepper: Red fox blood. Certain in herself and, though small, isn’t to be messed with. Hangs out with Tony and Rhodey in the outdoor incloser and protective of her friends.
  • Bruce: Euroasian lynx blood. Pretty shy and prefers solitude to company and can get snappy if you come into his part of the enclosure without permission. Tony helped him adjust to the facility and sometimes the two spend time with each other chilling outside, though there isn’t a lot of talking. He has dark spots that peppers his light skin.


There is probably more but that’s all for right now. You guys interested? Might make it A/B/O dynamics too but I’m not quite sure yet. If you are, I’ll try to write something. And it’ll probably be stony.


But, if you like it, anyone has permission to use this au! Give me credit and tag me/message me because I’d love to see/read what you guys so. Thanks!

title: Wish Upon a Star
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2EWbfpe

by Coquelicot7

Post Infinity War. Four year-old Morgan Stark waits for her daddy to come home from the stars.

Words: 684, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings

blog.name: lovelytonys
blog.title: tony stark & mcu
blog.description: A gal who is very passionate about a red-and-gold-armor-wearing hero. Call me Kay (or K, whichever).

summary:
You know what really speaks to me about Tony Stark? The way we see him work through low self esteem and inner negativity.
Like,...
body:
You know what really speaks to me about Tony Stark? The way we see him work through low self esteem and inner negativity.

Like, it’s a whole journey, and we see him go through every part of it.

We saw him go through this catalyst of self-loathing, this thing that really changed everything for the worse, which was, of course, finding out what Obadiah was doing with the company’s weapons. I mean, for the rest of my life, I’ll never forget the scene when Tony is watching the news and shoots his reflection in the glass panels. And since then, especially since becoming involved with SHIELD and the Avengers, I feel like he’s been surrounded by people and experiences that made it hard for him to dig himself out of that pit of rock-bottom self esteem.

But you know what I really like about this part of the journey? He still has these moments, these beautiful moments where he is proud of himself or he is happy with himself or he does feel like he’s worthy of good things, like that big smile after he creates the new element, or when he decided to get the arc reactor removed. And, as someone who has struggled with low self esteem, I get that.

And then we see Tony kind of start to get better. I think most of us can agree that by Homecoming and even his first scene of Infinity War (unfortunately, no further than his first scene), Tony does seem to be generally happier and probably putting in effort to make himself happier. But there’s these moments when he, almost by instinct, slips back into that negative self talk, like when Peter said he wanted to be like Tony and Tony says with no hesitation “I wanted you to be better”.

Now THAT, my friends, speaks to me. As someone who has mostly gotten over her self esteem issues but still has instinctual negative self-talk as a result, yeah. That speaks to me.

(Unfortunately Infinity War had to happen which quite possibly sent Tony flying backward to square one which hurts me personally ahhhhh)

Anyway. Tony Stark is the most dynamic and well written character in the MCU with an amazing and often relatable emotional journey and that’s why we stan

summary: Hi, if you are not too busy or if it's not a bother, could you do a little story where they get into an argument because one...
question: Hi, if you are not too busy or if it's not a bother, could you do a little story where they get into an argument because one think the other is having an affair but they make up after. thank you in advance if you do it.
answer:
(all characters are 18+), shoutout to @starkerchemistryy for always reading over my stuff when I don’t like it :)

“Pete?” Tony called as he walked into the penthouse, shrugging out of his suit jacket and toeing off his shoes. “You in here?”

The silence Tony was greeted with was unnerving; Peter was always here after Tony had to deal with a day at SI, be it with takeaway and Netflix, or with other means of relieving Tony of his stress, and he always yelled back when Tony called. 

“Jay, where’s Peter?” Tony asked, eyes narrowing as a scan of the kitchen and adjoining living room turned up null. 

‘Mister Parker is in the bedroom, sir. He appears to be somewhat distressed.’

Tony’s brow furrowed, and he threw his jacked haphazardly over the back of the sofa as he strode towards the bedroom, pushing the door open to reveal Peter curled up on their bed, chest heaving with choked-back sobs. 

“Peter?” Tony asked carefully, aware of how too much overstimulation could at times make the boy lash out when he was upset. “Sweetheart? What’s wrong?”

Tony almost jumped out of his skin when Peter’s head shot up, eyes red from crying and blazing with anger. 

“You fucking asshole.” Peter hissed, teeth clenched. “You fucking asshole.”

“I’m inclined to agree.” said Tony evenly, holding his hands up in a defensive pose. “But, uh, what exactly did I do?”

“If I wasn’t good enough for you, you could have just fucking told me!” Peter growled, sitting up enough to face his boyfriend. “There was no need to lead me on and then fucking humiliate me!”

“Darling, believe me, I really have no idea what you’re talking about.” Tony insisted, fighting the urge to take a step back in the wake of Peter’s murderous gaze. “You’re going to have to spell this one out for me.”

Peter scoffed, but reached forward to grab something off the bedside table, and Tony found himself ducking to avoid being smacked in the face with a magazine that Peter had launched in the direction of his head. Across the front cover was emblazoned a picture of Tony hugging a young blonde outside of an apartment building, accompanied by the caption ‘Stark’s new fling; ex-boyfriend Peter Parker left in the dust as we wonder who this blonde bombshell is.’ 

“Peter…” Tony breathed, dropping the magazine and turning back towards his boyfriend, who was still staring daggers at him. “You think I’ve been cheating on you?”

“Don’t fucking patronise me, Tony Stark.” Peter spat. “It’s pretty evident, and JARVIS told me that the images weren’t doctored.”

“I’m not exactly feeling her up on the front doorstep, am I?Just because I’m hugging someone doesn’t mean I’m cheating on you, Peter.” Tony said firmly. “No matter what the gossip rags say.”

“You look pretty cosy with each other.” Peter huffed, though his words began to loose their venom as Tony raised an eyebrow and stared him down. “Why were you with her anyway? Why wouldn’t you have told me?”

“I was reading over her dissertation before she submitted it. I was hugging her to wish her good luck after the months of hard work she put in.”

“Is that really the best excuse you could-”

“Peter, get over your anger and fucking listen to me.” Tony interrupted through gritted teeth, fighting to keep his voice level. “Her father works as a janitor at SI, I overheard some talk of whether or not she could apply for a grant for a tutor via one of the Stark Foundations because there’s no way her dad could afford one, and I said I was happy to look over it.”

“Oh.”

Peter’s voice was small and quiet, and he dropped his eyes, realising the mistake he’d made. 

“How could you even think I’d do that to you, Pete? How could you think you’d have to hear about something like that from a gossip rag before I told you?”

“I-.” Peter swallowed. “I’m sorry. I’m really sorry Tony, it was the heat of the moment and I just saw it and-

“That hurts, Peter.” laughed Tony humourlessly. “Hurts more than anything that you think that’s the kind of man I am. I’m gonna take a shower, and then I’m gonna sleep on the couch.”

“Tony, please baby-”

“Give me some space, Peter.” Tony sighed, holding up a hand. “We’ll talk it over tomorrow. Goodnight.”

Peter didn’t move, but stayed curled up in the centre of their giant king-sized bed, burying his face in Tony’s cushion, looking for comfort in the lingering smell of his boyfriend. He listened as Tony showered and looked for clothes in the spare bedroom, then the rustling of the sofa blanket as he settled down. Peter’s immediate thought was how Tony shouldn’t be sleeping on the sofa; it was bad for his back, and he’d be in pain when he woke up tomorrow, which in turn made Peter well up with tears at how frighteningly domestic they’d become. 

Before he knew what he was doing, Peter was crawling out from under the covers, pulling on one of Tony’s oversized band tees that had been thrown haphazardly over the back of a chair, and was making his way out of the bedroom and into the living room, following the dim blue glow of Tony’s arc reactor. 

“Tony?” Peter whispered, not wanting to wake the older man. “Tony?”

There was a beat of silence, before the lump on the couch sighed, and Tony turned over so he was facing the boy.

“You okay, Peter?”

“No.” Peter shook his head, wiping fiercely at the tears that tried to spill down his cheeks. “I’m so sorry Tony, you know I didn’t mean it. I know you’d never cheat on me, but fuck I love you so much and I’m so scared you’ll realise you can have so much better than me and just up and leave.”

“I’d never leave you, Peter.” Tony said firmly. “I love you too much, I’m too selfish to leave you.”

“You could have better.” Peter whispered, his voice breaking. “You could have so much better than me… I’m way too young, so inexperienced in everything, so naïve, insanely paranoid-”

“Stop it.” Tony snapped. “For fuck’s sake, just shut up and come here.”

Tony pulled back the blanket that was draped over him and opened his arms in invitation, and Peter didn’t even think before he was falling into them, sobbing into Tony’s chest as the older man ran soothing hands up and down his back. 

“I love you for who you are, Peter.” Tony murmured into Peter’s hair. “We just need to figure some things out, yeah?”

“Yeah.” Peter rasped. “Are we- are we okay?”

“Of course we are, angel.” Tony chuckled. “I’m not happy, don’t get me wrong, and I’ll be moody about it for a while, but we’re okay.”

Peter’s eyes fluttered shut with relief, and before he could think about it, he was tilting his head up, blindly searching for comfort in the warmth of Tony’s lips. Tony knew he should object, keep the kiss chaste and gently push the boy away, but couldn’t resist leaning in, licking into Peter’s soft mouth as the boy whined needily, letting him tangle long, slim fingers in his greying hair. 

“Peter, stop.” Tony panted eventually, tracing gentle fingers down his boyfriend’s soft cheek. “We need to talk first, yeah baby?”

“That’s-.” Peter swallowed, then nodded. “That’s probably a good idea.“

“Don’t take it the wrong way.” Tony said carefully, assessing Peter’s still teary eyes. “God, it’s so hard to resist you, I just- sex probably isn’t the best way to deal with this.”

“No, I get it Tony, really.” Peter assured. “Will you come back to bed with me? Just cuddle with me?”

“Yeah.” Tony nodded, shifting slightly. “Couldn’t sleep without holding you in my arms.”

“Of course we are, angel.” Tony chuckled. “I’m not happy, don’t get me wrong, and I’ll be moody about it for a while, but we’re okay.”

Peter’s eyes fluttered shut with relief, and before he could think about it, he was tilting his head up, blindly searching for comfort in the warmth of Tony’s lips. Tony knew he should object, keep the kiss chaste and gently push the boy away, but couldn’t resist leaning in, licking into Peter’s soft mouth as the boy whined needily, letting him tangle long, slim fingers in his greying hair. 

“Peter, stop.” Tony panted eventually, tracing gentle fingers down his boyfriend’s soft cheek. “We need to talk first, yeah baby?”

“That’s-.” Peter swallowed, then nodded. “That’s probably a good idea.“

“Don’t take it the wrong way.” Tony said carefully, assessing Peter’s still teary eyes. “God, it’s so hard to resist you, I just- sex probably isn’t the best way to deal with this.”

“No, I get it Tony, really.” Peter assured. “Will you come back to bed with me? Just cuddle with me?”

“Yeah.” Tony nodded, shifting slightly. “Couldn’t sleep without holding you in my arms.”
